name: Poached Eggs
description:
Poached egg is a game where you play as a hungry fox trying to gather a dozen eggs to eat. Though there is no free meal for this fox, when you grab an egg the chickens will come after you to get it back.

These chickens are too aggressive for this fox and must be kited around in order to grab these eggs and go.

This was made by a two man team, with only experience in coding. This was a fun project and we learned a lot of things. We would like to continue to work on this if people show interest in this being fleshed out.

Created within 72 hours for the Mini Jam 99: Birds.  (Assets were made in this time)

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to dash

Mouse Sensitivity can be changed by pressing Esc.
